mapper.select: /* getRecruitNum */ SELECT CONCAT('제', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), '-', LPAD((SELECT IFNULL(max(siri.RECRUIT_SN), 0)+1 FROM cam_inside.dj_recruit_info siri), '2', '0'), '호') AS RECRUIT_NUM FROM DUAL

/*getRecruitList*/ SELECT RE.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IRI.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_INFO IRI, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY IRI.REG_DT ) RE ORDER BY RE.REG_DT DESC

/*getCommissionerList*/ SELECT RE.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IRCI.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_COMMISSIONER_INFO IRCI, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY IRCI.REG_DT ) RE ORDER BY RE.REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert:
/* setRecruitInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_INFO ( RECRUIT_NUM, RECRUIT_TITLE, RECRUIT_DETAIL, UPLOAD_DT, UPLOAD_TEXT, START_DT, END_DT, START_TIME, END_TIME, JOB_POSITION_ETC, ELIGIBILITY_ETC, WORK_TYPE, ADMISSION, RECEIPT_DOCU, REMARK, RECRUIT_STATUS_SN, RECRUIT_STATUS_TEXT, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME ) VALUE ( #{recruitNum}, #{recruitTitle}, #{recruitDetail}, #{uploadDt}, #{uploadText}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{jobPositionEtc}, #{eligibilityEtc}, #{workType}, #{admission}, #{receiptDocu}, #{remark}, #{recruitStatusSn}, #{recruitStatusText}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_RECRUIT_INFO'

/* setRecruitAreaInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_AREA_INFO ( RECRUIT_INFO_SN, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, TEAM_SEQ, TEAM_NAME, JOB, RECRUITMENT, CAREER_TYPE_SN, CAREER_TYPE_NAME, DUTY, CAREER, WORK_TYPE, QUALIFICATION ) VALUES
( #{recruitInfoSn}, #{item.deptSeq}, #{item.deptName}, #{item.teamSeq}, #{item.teamName}, #{item.job}, #{item.recruitment}, #{item.careerTypeSn}, #{item.careerTypeName}, #{item.duty}, #{item.career}, #{item.workType}, #{item.qualification} )

/* setCommissionerInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_COMMISSIONER_INFO ( ID, NAME, FIRST_RRN_NAME, SECOND_RRN_NAME, TEL_NUM, EMAIL, BELONG, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{name}, #{firstRrnName}, #{secondRrnName}, #{telNum}, #{email}, #{belong}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_RECRUIT_AREA_INFO WHERE RECRUIT_INFO_SN = #{RECRUIT_INFO_SN} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
